ModMetaData.name: Milkshakes - Digital Deluxe Edition
ModMetaData.author: Sierra
ModMetaData.description:
[h1]Mod Version: v1.3[/h1]
My milkshake brings all the modders to the yard.
This mod adds 6 new craftable recreation/luxury food (like chocolate).
[b]Features:[/b] [list] [*]Milkshakes [/list] Grants Mood Buff (1) for 12 hours after consumption.
[list] [*]Ambrosia Milkshakes [/list] Grants Mood Buff (5) for 18 hours after consumption.
[list] [*]Blueberry Milkshakes [*]Strawberry Milkshakes [*]Mixed Berry Milkshakes [/list] Grants Mood Buff (2) for 18 hours after consumption.
[list] [*]Chocolate Milkshakes [/list] Grants Mood Buff (3) for 24 hours after consumption.
[h1]Want to mix and match instead? [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2595720152]Milkshakes - Collector's Edition[/url][/h1]
[b]Recommended Mods:[/b] [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2630669656]RimFantasy - Gemstones[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2630670287]RimFantasy - Temperature Regulation[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2632845986]RimFantasy - Crystallic Lighting[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2634323159]RimFantasy - Arcane Batons[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1916352291]RimTraits - Medieval Talent[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2206957172]RimTraits - General Traits[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2244594116]RimTraits - Vanilla Trait Colors[/url] [/list]
[b]Compatibility:[/b] [list] [*]Compatible as long as you're not lactose intolerant. [/list]
[b]Balance:[/b] Wow, so balanced.
[h1][url=https://discord.gg/rimworld]Click here to join us on the Community Discord![/url][/h1] [url=https://ko-fi.com/sierra0001][img]https://i.imgur.com/SBiUpbW.png[/img][/url]

[*]Modded Food Textures from: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2553700067]Medieval Overhaul[/url] [*]Modded Clothing Textures from: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2023513450]Vanilla Factions Expanded - Medieval[/url] [/list]
